metadata.title: CVE-2024-34156 on Ubuntu 22.04 FIPS Undergoing Certification (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Calling Decoder.Decode on a message which contains deeply nested structurescan cause a panic due to stack exhaustion. This is a follow-up toCVE-2022-30635.

criterions.comment: golang-1.13 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.17 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.18 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.20 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
